mapper.sql: uuid, username, password, email, phone, nickname, qq_open_id, remark, valid_time, is_delete, update_time, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into authority_user (username, password, email, phone) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username=#{username}, password=#{password}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone},update_time=now()
insert into authority_user (username, password, email, phone) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select username from authority_user where username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
